engine.components

Class LinkComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.core.entity.EntityComponent
      • engine.components.LinkComponent

  • public class LinkComponent
extends EntityComponent
    Links two objects such that when one is removed, the other is also removed.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)
